node.address: Carrera 10 Calle San Antonio No 25-121 P.1, Getsem , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
The abundance of restaurants and bars, provide a lovely place to hangout and enjoy the atmosphere and socialize. You can find yourself wondering the cobbled streets, viewing its many historic buildings and monuments, or simply relaxing in one of the squares being entertained by the night life, Getsemani will surely steal your heart.

We offer clean, safe, comfortable, and meaningful accommodation experience. Amenities consist of A/C’s in each room, privacy panels, individual power, lighting, and locker space. We also have hot water available in all showers. Special bed size (200cm x 90cm), for those of us with longer legs.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hostel.
La Buleka Hostel offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Felipe de Barajas Castle, Cartagena de Indias Convention Centre and Cartagena's Modern Art Museum. The nearest airport is Rafael Núñez International Airport, 7 km from La Buleka Hostel.
Getsemani is a great choice for travellers interested in nightlife, culture and architecture.

description.description: Plaza de la Trinidad is a cultural center for locals and travelers that wish to experience the entertainment including musicians, dancers, acrobats, and jugglers that perform for spare change. La Buleka Hostel in Cartagena de Indias provides adults-only accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 2.4 km from Cartagena's Walls and 2.9 km from Bolivar Park.
